wantStartMissionPhrase: Do you want to start a new mission?
wantResetProgressPhrase: Are you sure you want to discontinue the mission and lose all your progress?
wantExitPhrase: Do you want to quit the game?
returnToGamePhrase: You'll be returned to game process
repeatLastPhrase: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command
exitPhrase: We had fun together. Let's do this again soon.
wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase: Do you want to start mission from the beginning?
